title: Spurs And Fans Celebrate 5th NBA Title
teaser: The San Antonio Spurs beat the Miami Heat 104-87 to take the best-of-seven series four games to one.
contentencoded:
The San Antonio Spurs beat the Miami Heat 104-87 in San Antonio to take the best-of-seven series four games to one.

Kawhi Leonard scored 22 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, his third straight big game in the series, and was named the Most Valuable Player for the series. Leonard is just 22 — the youngest Finals MVP since his teammate Tim Duncan won the honor in 1999.

Kevin Arnovitz, NBA editor for ESPN.com, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the team and the Spurs’ win.
